topic.title: Everybody Deserves What They Get
topic.body: *We strive for justice and morality, but a just and moral way of life is impossible to us. From ancient times to the modern age, the life of a human being has been nothing more than a frantic striving to be the criminal and not the victim. A vast majority of the people (I would say 99.99% of them) end up as the victims—there is no way of remedying the situation because the victims are mired in ignorance, cowardice, and malice, and are incapable of confronting the criminals.*

topic.title: Can't trust a soul in this hellscape, I recon...
topic.body: Jews took it all, we just live in the fallout getting raped and murdered by our own governments.

topic.title: Why can't people just be normal?
topic.body:
Is it really so hard to not to be a disgusting perverted liar and a thief?

Is it so hard to be an intelligent functioning contributing member to society that doesn't engage in criminal activity?

Why are so many people degenerates?

Why are there child sacrificing, sex slaving, cannibalistic Satan worshiping faggots and whores controlling society?

Kikes!

topic.title: The U.S. Constitution is a failed experiment, like Communism
topic.body:
It failed pretty much on day one, and it was a joke by the time of Lincoln, Wilson, or FDR. It has become a propaganda symbol for justifying government power - the very opposite of what it was intended!

We need something a thousand times stricter and more explicit in its checks on government! All power to municipalities, no Federal power except for protecting borders and killing commies! Anyone who advocates expanding the government gets tortured to death on pay-per-view!

topic.title: Coalfax.me has apparently been FBI'd
topic.body:
A lot of people are asking, so I'm going to copy-paste the same reply to them all.

Something happened. Our web dev guy took the site down and deleted the source code. It took me forever to get an update out of him, and he won't discuss any details. I believe he got a visit from the FBI or local law enforcement. He's being way too cagey about the whole thing, more reluctant to discuss it than I consider normal from this person. He'd tell me if it were any other reason. I believe he's under legal pressure not to discuss it. I feel bad for him.

So, we got on the news twice, we made a lot of people very very angry, and we showed the world that there are still people who don't subscribe to the Gospel of Diversity. I feel like we accomplished our goals. I'm sad the site died, but I'm glad my friend wasn't disappeared into an FBI black site. Someone else may take up the Coalfax mantle now. Our cause will never die.

Thank you to everyone who submitted coalburners and supported us. We, the silent majority, still exist.
